member.name: T:CreativeGurus.Weather.Wunderground.Models.QueryType
member.summary: QueryTypes to use qhen querying the Weather Underground API

member.name: F:CreativeGurus.Weather.Wunderground.Models.QueryType.AirportCode
member.summary: Sets the query type to use an Airport Code. Must provide AirportCode of the location to query.

member.name: F:CreativeGurus.Weather.Wunderground.Models.QueryType.AutoIp
member.summary: Sets the query type to use the IP address of the calling client for location data.

member.name: F:CreativeGurus.Weather.Wunderground.Models.QueryType.GlobalCity
member.summary: Sets the query type to be a global (non US) city. Must provide Country and City of the location to query.

member.name: F:CreativeGurus.Weather.Wunderground.Models.QueryType.GPS
member.summary: Sets the query type to use GPS Latitude and Longitude. Must provide Latitude and Longitude of the location to query.

member.name: F:CreativeGurus.Weather.Wunderground.Models.QueryType.LinkId
member.summary: Sets the query type to use a Link ID. Must provide LinkId of the location to query.

member.name: F:CreativeGurus.Weather.Wunderground.Models.QueryType.PWSId
member.summary: Sets the query type to use a PWSId (Personal Weather Station). Must provide the PWSId of the station to query.

member.name: F:CreativeGurus.Weather.Wunderground.Models.QueryType.USCity
member.summary: Sets the query type to use a US City and State. Must provide the US City and State of the location to query.

member.name: F:CreativeGurus.Weather.Wunderground.Models.QueryType.ZipCode
member.summary: Sets the query type to use a US Zip Code. Must provide the US Zip Code of the location to query.

member.name: T:CreativeGurus.Weather.Wunderground.Models.Feature
member.summary: Feature to use when querying the Weather Underground API

member.name: P:CreativeGurus.Weather.Wunderground.QueryOptions.City
member.summary: City name to query

member.name: P:CreativeGurus.Weather.Wunderground.QueryOptions.State
member.summary: US state name to query

member.name: P:CreativeGurus.Weather.Wunderground.QueryOptions.Country
member.summary: Country name to query

member.name: P:CreativeGurus.Weather.Wunderground.QueryOptions.Latitude
member.summary: Latitude GPS to query

member.name: P:CreativeGurus.Weather.Wunderground.QueryOptions.Longitude
member.summary: Longitude GPS to query

member.name: P:CreativeGurus.Weather.Wunderground.QueryOptions.Language
member.summary: Language to return data in (Default = EN / US English)

member.name: P:CreativeGurus.Weather.Wunderground.QueryOptions.UsePWS
member.summary: Indicates if Personal Weather Station data should be returned. Default = true

member.name: P:CreativeGurus.Weather.Wunderground.QueryOptions.UseBestFct
member.summary: Use Weather Undergrond Best Forecast for forecast. Default = true

member.name: P:CreativeGurus.Weather.Wunderground.QueryOptions.IpAddress
member.summary: Allows the detected IP address of the client to be overwritten with the provided IP address.

member.name: P:CreativeGurus.Weather.Wunderground.QueryOptions.AirportCode
member.summary: Airport identifier code to query

member.name: P:CreativeGurus.Weather.Wunderground.QueryOptions.LinkId
member.summary: Weather Underground Link Id to query.

member.name: P:CreativeGurus.Weather.Wunderground.QueryOptions.ZipCode
member.summary: US Zip code to query

member.name: P:CreativeGurus.Weather.Wunderground.QueryOptions.PWSId
member.summary: Personal Weather Station id to query
